item.title: Thieves use explosives to steal gold 'masterpieces' from Dutch museum
item.description: Four ancient gold artefacts were stolen from Drents Museum in Assen.

item.title: Trump says he believes US will 'get Greenland'
item.description: The president told reporters the island's 57,000 residents "want to be with us".

item.title: Deadline for Israeli withdrawal from Lebanon expires, but troops will stay
item.description: Lebanon has urged residents not to return to border areas for the time being.

item.title: Rebels kill 13 foreign peacekeepers in DR Congo
item.description: The M23 rebel group has launched an advance on Goma, a city of more than one million people.

item.title: Mexican workers set up tent city to house deportees from US
item.description: As well as a place to sleep, returning Mexicans will receive food, medicine and help in obtaining documents.
